issue.title: [CI][Ruby] Don't install gem documents
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9739](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9739). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Don't install gem documents in Docker environment to reduce size and time in building and pulling.

More detail can be found at
 https://guides.rubygems.org/command-reference/#installupdate-options-2
